overview: Michael Buban has over 23 years of experience in sales, marketing, management and client services. Michael’s experience in the area of document management began early in his career, as an account executive for the well-respected Merrill Corporation in Dallas, Texas. Believing he could take a good product and make it even better, he and his business partner, Bob, began Texas Legal Copies, Inc. in 1995. After enjoying over a decade of success, iDOC Corp was born out of desire to meet the new challenges presented by the digital revolution. As President/CEO of iDOC Corp, Michael strives to provide cutting edge document management services to his clients. Michael lives in Dallas and enjoys watching the Dallas Stars and riding together with friends on his Harley-Davidson.
